titles.title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide that grants under the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program may be use for gun safe giveaway programs, and for other purposes.

To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide that grants under the Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program may be use for gun safe giveaway programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
